tmpl:
{{#if ${bannerLists}}}
{{#each ${bannerLists}}}
{{#eq type 1}}
{{#eq @index 0}} {{{nLazyImage imgUrl title 'false'}}} {{^}} {{{nLazyImage imgUrl title 'true'}}} {{/eq}}
{{/eq}} {{#eq type 2}}
{{{nLazyImage video.coverImgUrl title 'false'}}}
{{{lazyVideo video.url ../${settings}.videoMouted false}}}
{{/eq}}
{{#if ${settings}.showText}} {{#if title}}

{{title}}

{{/if}} {{#if subTitle}}
{{subTitle}}
{{/if}} {{#if summary}}

{{summary}}

{{/if}} {{/if}}
{{/each}}
{{#if ${settings}.navigation}}
{{/if}}
{{#each ${bannerLists}}}
{{#eq type 1}}
{{{nLazyImage imgUrl title 'false'}}}
{{/eq}} {{#eq type 2}}
{{{nLazyImage video.coverImgUrl title 'false'}}}
{{/eq}}
{{/each}}
{{^}} {{{nNoDataPrompt ${i18n.noData}}}} {{/if}}

bannerLists.title: 滴答滴答所多
bannerLists.summary: 按时大萨达阿萨德按时打算按时啊 按时啊是啊啊啊
